## ğŸ› ï¸ How to Use the Validator

### Basic Validation (Read-only)
```bash
python3 validate-german-translations.py
```

### Generate Report File
```bash
python3 validate-german-translations.py --output GERMAN-VALIDATION-REPORT.md
```

### Auto-Fix Common Issues (Dry Run - Preview Only)
```bash
python3 validate-german-translations.py --fix --dry-run
```

### Auto-Fix Common Issues (Apply Changes)
```bash
python3 validate-german-translations.py --fix
```
